embed.title: UnitConverter
embed.description:
A fully functional public Discord bot that automatically corrects non-SI units (imperial, etc) to SI-ones (metric, etc) This bot will listen for any messages in Discord that contain non-SI units and when detected, reply with the message converted to SI-Units.

*Are you tired of a car that weighs 100 Stones, is 10 feet high, and can drive 50 miles at 5 degrees freedom? Worry no more! Your car weighs 0.64t, is 3.05m high, and can drive 80.47km at -15Â°C from now on!*
